statements: SELECT * FROM WasteManagement WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT id, location, quantity FROM WasteManagement WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic'
SELECT * FROM WasteManagement ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT location, waste_type, disposal_method FROM WasteManagement WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM WasteManagement WHERE location = 'California'
SELECT * FROM WasteManagement WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT location, waste_type FROM WasteManagement WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic'
SELECT id, location, quantity FROM WasteManagement WHERE disposal_method LIKE '%incineration%'
SELECT * FROM WasteManagement WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 200 AND disposal_method = 'Landfill'
SELECT id, quantity, disposal_method FROM WasteManagement WHERE location IN ('Area A', 'Area B')
SELECT id, practice_name, description FROM WasteManagementPractices;
SELECT id, method_name, description FROM DisposalMethods;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementPractices WHERE id = 1;
SELECT practice_name, description FROM WasteManagementPractices WHERE description LIKE '%recycling%';
SELECT id, method_name FROM DisposalMethods ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementPractices WHERE id = 1;
SELECT method_name, description FROM DisposalMethods WHERE id <= 5 ORDER BY method_name ASC;
SELECT practice_name, description FROM WasteManagementPractices WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM DisposalMethods WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementPractices WHERE practice_name LIKE 'Recycle%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_practices;
SELECT id, practice_name FROM waste_management_practices ORDER BY practice_name DESC;
SELECT description, location FROM waste_management_practices WHERE location='Bristol';
SELECT * FROM disposal_methods WHERE method_name='Landfill' OR method_name='Incineration';
SELECT id, method_name, disposal_site FROM disposal_methods ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_practices WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT practice_name, description FROM waste_management_practices WHERE id = 3;
SELECT method_name, description, disposal_site FROM disposal_methods WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY method_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_records WHERE date_recorded > '2021-01-01' AND quantity >= 100 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT wp.practice_name, wr.waste_type FROM waste_management_practices wp JOIN waste_records wr ON wp.id = wr.disposal_method_id;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_practices;
SELECT id, practice_name FROM waste_management_practices ORDER BY practice_name DESC;
SELECT practice_type, COUNT(*) AS total_practices FROM waste_management_practices GROUP BY practice_type;
SELECT method_name, method_description FROM disposal_methods WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM disposal_sites WHERE site_capacity > 500 ORDER BY site_capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_practices WHERE id = 1;
SELECT practice_name, practice_type FROM waste_management_practices WHERE practice_type = 'Recycling';
SELECT site_name, site_address FROM disposal_sites WHERE site_capacity > 1000 ORDER BY site_capacity DESC;
SELECT method_name, method_description FROM disposal_methods WHERE method_type = 'Landfill' ORDER BY method_name ASC;
SELECT practice_name, practice_description, category_name FROM waste_management_practices JOIN waste_categories ON waste_management_practices.id = waste_categories.id;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_practices;
SELECT waste_type, collection_point FROM waste_management_practices;
SELECT collection_point, collection_date FROM waste_management_practices ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_points WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT method_name, description FROM disposal_methods;
SELECT * FROM waste_management_practices WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic'
SELECT collection_point, count(waste_id) as waste_count FROM waste_management_practices GROUP BY collection_point ORDER BY waste_count DESC
SELECT disposal_records.collection_date, disposal_methods.method_name FROM disposal_records JOIN disposal_methods ON disposal_records.method_id = disposal_methods.method_id

SELECT waste_categories.category_name, waste_categories.category_description, COUNT(waste_management_practices.waste_id) as waste_count FROM waste_categories LEFT JOIN waste_management_practices ON waste_categories.category_id = waste_management_practices.waste_id GROUP BY waste_categories.category_name

SELECT waste_management_practices.waste_type, waste_collection_points.location FROM waste_management_practices LEFT JOIN waste_collection_points ON waste_management_practices.collection_point = waste_collection_points.point_name ORDER BY waste_management_practices.collection_date DESC
